name: sodium sulfide production | sodium sulfide | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12429/documentation

This dataset represents the production of sodium sulfide from the carbothermic reduction of sodium sulfate using coal (see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sodium_sulfide);The carbon dioxide by-product is assumed to be directly emitted. 

Starts with the delivery of material and energy inputs on site.

This activity ends with the production of sodium sulphide.
This dataset includes raw materials, energy uses, infrastructure and emissions.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Arbitrary time period chosen for the proxy.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Reaction of sodium sulfate with carbon: Na2SO4 (MW 142.042) + 2 C (MW 12.011) => Na2S (MW 78.046) + 2 CO2 (MW 44.009).
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Raw materials are modelled with a stoichiometric calculation and 100% yield assumption. Energy consumptions are modelled with data from literature. The emissions are estimated. Infrastructures are calculated with standard values.

exchanges.description: Formula: Na2S

flow.name: sodium sulfide
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

exchanges.description: Mass balance. Represents the non-carbon, thus unreacted, fraction of the coal input.
